tunisian_cuisine.description: Tunisian food is known for its vibrant flavors, using spices like harissa, cumin, and coriander. It often features semolina, olives, tomatoes, and seafood.

dishes.name: Asida
dishes.description: A thick, sweet porridge made from flour, typically served with a honey-butter sauce or date syrup.

dishes.name: Baklawa
dishes.description: A sweet, rich pastry made of layers of phyllo dough, filled with chopped nuts and soaked in honey syrup.

dishes.name: Brik
dishes.description: A thin, crispy pastry (malsouka) triangle filled with a whole egg, tuna, capers, and parsley.

dishes.name: Chakchouka
dishes.description: A savory dish of peppers, onions, and tomatoes stewed with spices and topped with poached eggs.

dishes.name: Couscous
dishes.description: Steamed semolina grains served with a savory stew of meat (lamb, chicken) and vegetables.

dishes.name: Fricass√©
dishes.description: A deep-fried, boat-shaped bun stuffed with tuna, harissa, boiled potato, olives, and an egg.

dishes.name: Harissa
dishes.description: A very spicy and flavorful chili pepper paste, used as a condiment.

dishes.name: Hlou
dishes.description: A sweet fruit salad or compote often made with peaches, apricots, and rose water, served for celebrations.

dishes.name: Kafteji
dishes.description: A dish of deep-fried, chopped vegetables (peppers, potatoes, squash) mixed together and served with bread.

dishes.name: Kamouniya
dishes.description: A hearty, cumin-heavy stew, usually made with beef or lamb, chickpeas, and spinach.

dishes.name: Lablabi
dishes.description: A hearty, spicy chickpea soup flavored with garlic, cumin, and olive oil, often eaten for breakfast.

dishes.name: Liftiyya
dishes.description: A slow-cooked lamb or beef stew from Sfax, featuring fermented rye for a unique sour flavor.

dishes.name: Melloukhia
dishes.description: A unique stew made from jute leaves, cooked into a thick, viscous green sauce and served with bread or couscous.

dishes.name: Pasta
dishes.description: Typically refers to short pasta (like penne) cooked in a rich, spicy tomato and meat sauce.

dishes.name: Salade Mechweya
dishes.description: A smoky grilled salad made from charred peppers, tomatoes, and onions, mixed with tuna and olives.

dishes.name: Sandwich Tounsi
dishes.description: A classic baguette sandwich stuffed with tuna, egg, olives, harissa, grilled peppers, and fries.

dishes.name: Zgougou
dishes.description: A festive dessert pudding made from aleppo pine nuts, topped with whipped cream and nuts.

nutritional_notes.disclaimer: Values are estimates per typical serving. Actual nutritional content can vary based on recipe, portion size, and specific ingredients used.
